Abilities.Name: Blaze
Abilities.Description: Increases the damage of Fire-type moves by 50% when the user's HP is below 1/3 its max.

Abilities.Name: Solar Power
Abilities.Description: Increases the user's Special Attack by 50% but HP decreases by 12.5% of its max HP at the end of every turn.

Moves.Name: Dragon Pulse
Moves.Description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

Moves.Name: Fire Blast
Moves.Description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all- consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Moves.Name: Hurricane
Moves.Description: The user attacks by wrapping the target in a fierce wind. This may also confuse the target.

Moves.Name: Focus Blast
Moves.Description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Moves.Name: Overheat
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target with all its might. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Moves.Name: Tera Blast
Moves.Description: If the user has Terastallized, it unleashes energy of its Tera Type. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or Sp. Atk statâwhichever is higher for the user.

Moves.Name: Sunny Day
Moves.Description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type attacks. The sunlight also lowers the power of Water-type attacks.

Moves.Name: Inferno
Moves.Description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

Abilities.Name: Flower Veil
Abilities.Description: Ally Grass-type Pokemon are protected from attacks that cause status conditions or lower stats.

Abilities.Name: Symbiosis
Abilities.Description: The user passes its Held item to an ally if the ally uses up its Held item.

Moves.Name: Moonblast
Moves.Description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Moves.Name: Light Screen
Moves.Description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special moves for five turns.

Moves.Name: Petal Dance
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

Moves.Name: Disarming Voice
Moves.Description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

Moves.Name: Grassy Terrain
Moves.Description: The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Flower Veil
Abilities.Description: Ally Grass-type Pokemon are protected from attacks that cause status conditions or lower stats.

Abilities.Name: Symbiosis
Abilities.Description: The user passes its Held item to an ally if the ally uses up its Held item.

Moves.Name: Moonblast
Moves.Description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Moves.Name: Light Screen
Moves.Description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special moves for five turns.

Moves.Name: Disarming Voice
Moves.Description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

Moves.Name: Petal Dance
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

Moves.Name: Grassy Terrain
Moves.Description: The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass-type moves.

Moves.Name: Grass Knot
Moves.Description: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

Abilities.Name: Disguise
Abilities.Description: Once per battle, the user is protected by its Disguise from one damaging attack move. Does not protect against entry hazards or weather damage. The user loses 12.5% of its max HP if the Disguise breaks.

Moves.Name: Play Rough
Moves.Description: The user attacks by playing rough with the target. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

Moves.Name: Shadow Claw
Moves.Description: The user attacks by slashing the target with a sharp claw made from shadows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Moves.Name: Shadow Sneak
Moves.Description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

Moves.Name: Wood Hammer
Moves.Description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

Moves.Name: Misty Terrain
Moves.Description: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.
